name: SURVAIMA
description:
Simple Roguelike where you become more powerful by collaborating with AI.
- random challenges and buffs so try once more if you have lost very quick
- default wasd movement and LMB to shoot
- it was hard to make "game balance" balanced, so I left what I hope to not be very boring but so you can die
- scripts & sprites: me | music: found some free on itch.io
- there are more content than you can see on screenshots(have no time), so check it out
